title: Conservation agriculture and weed management effects on weed community and crop productivity of a rice-maize rotation

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 10

Author(s): Subhra Sahoo, Mahmoud F. Seleiman, Dhirendra Kumar Roy, Shivani Ranjan, Sumit Sow, Raj Kumar Jat, Bushra A. Alhammad, Harun Gitari
